name: tails-offline-crypto-helpers
description: A collection of misc scripts and html files for use in tails offline

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:cli && bun run build:web && bun run build:inline-scripts && bun run build:resources
scripts.build:cli: bun run build:cli:linux && bun run build:cli:macos
scripts.build:cli:linux: bun build cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64-baseline --outfile dist/cli/tails-offline-crypto-helpers && chmod +x dist/cli/tails-offline-crypto-helpers
scripts.build:cli:macos: bun build cli/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64-baseline --outfile dist/cli/macos-offline-crypto-helpers && chmod +x dist/cli/macos-offline-crypto-helpers
scripts.lint: bun run lint:es || true && bun run lint:typecheck
scripts.lint:typecheck: bunx tsc --noEmit --project src && bunx tsc --noEmit --project cli && bunx tsc --noEmit --project scripts
